name: Sukeban Jansi Ryuko
overview:
Sukeban Jansi Ryuko (スケバン雀士 竜子) is an arcade mahjong game for the Sega System 16A and 16B by Whiteboard released exclusively in Japan in 1988.

An evil group is trying to take over japan. It's up to Ryuko to stop this group by facing them in mahjong. Most of the intro explains the mechanics of the game, such as gaining points for power ups and the ESP which lets you see the opponent's hand for a brief moment.
